name: Armor Titan
notes: Used to guard tombs or strongholds. Stands motionless for ages.

tactics.1: Lunge to a new target, pinning them with Muscle 12
tactics.6: Leap and slam hammer, creating a seismic shockwave. Evade only. Basic attrition to all near

name: Blood Fungus
notes: Predatory mushrooms with acidic slime and spore clouds. Variant forms include Poison Slimer and Sapper Gill.

tactics.1: Move to a new target, leaving an acidic trail of slime
tactics.2: Squirt toxic ooze to a far range, equipment attrition
tactics.3: Squirt toxic ooze to a far range, equipment attrition
tactics.4: Squirt toxic ooze to a far range, equipment attrition
tactics.5: Squirt toxic ooze to a far range, equipment attrition
tactics.6: Spore cloud! Engulfs all foes at arm’s length. Roll Resist to avoid

name: Formian
notes: Ant-like beings with dual-wielded weapons. Slash two targets with tactic 6. Elders use earth magic.

tactics.1: Backstep and brace for attack. Ignores 1 attack afterward
tactics.2: Twin blades slash in a cross strike! Basic attrition
tactics.3: Twin blades slash in a cross strike! Basic attrition
tactics.4: Twin blades slash in a cross strike! Basic attrition
tactics.5: Twin blades slash in a cross strike! Basic attrition
tactics.6: Split target! Attack 2 different foes for basic attrition

name: Flame Kin
notes: Small fire elementals born of flame. Vanish and reappear in fire. Burning touch causes repeat attrition.

tactics.1: Vanish in smoke, reappear in/near open flame or from another Flame Kin
tactics.2: Burning Touch. Flesh attrition, repeats next round unless extinguished
tactics.3: Burning Touch. Flesh attrition, repeats next round unless extinguished
tactics.4: Burning Touch. Flesh attrition, repeats next round unless extinguished
tactics.5: Burning Touch. Flesh attrition, repeats next round unless extinguished
tactics.6: Flame Wave! Engulfs all in area. Same effect as Burning Touch to all foes

name: Giant
notes: Destroy everything around them with clubs or boulders. Intelligent with their own culture.

tactics.1: Stomp across battlefield. All in path roll Evade or suffer basic attrition
tactics.6: Boulder crusher! Slams rubble, sending rocks flying. All foes suffer basic attrition

name: Dragon Elder
notes: Immense dragons nearly immortal, capable of devastating terrain and casting powerful spells. Tail swipe inflicts brutal attrition.

tactics.1: Galloping flight. If on land, foes in the way roll Evade or suffer basic attrition
tactics.2: Fire and Magic. Roll for arcane or fiery attack
tactics.3: Fire and Magic. Roll for arcane or fiery attack
tactics.4: Fire and Magic. Roll for arcane or fiery attack
tactics.5: Fire and Magic. Roll for arcane or fiery attack
tactics.6: Tail Swipe! Sweeps the scene. With Evade: 1 basic attrition. Else: 1 basic + 1 brutal

name: Frog-Kin
notes: Master fighters from the frog empire. Can disarm, hit multiple foes, and strike without cover. Tactic 6 uses tongue or martial arts.

tactics.1: Leap! Move nearby, even over foes
tactics.6: Tongue Lash or martial arts. Roll Evade or lose 1 item

name: Yeti Folk
notes: Ape-like giants that live in high tundra. Easily enraged. Slam fists or throw snow boulders for massive destruction.

tactics.2: Slamming fists. 2 heavy attacks. Defense fail = destroy attrition. Evade avoids 1 fist
tactics.3: Slamming fists. 2 heavy attacks. Defense fail = destroy attrition. Evade avoids 1 fist
tactics.4: Slamming fists. 2 heavy attacks. Defense fail = destroy attrition. Evade avoids 1 fist
tactics.5: Slamming fists. 2 heavy attacks. Defense fail = destroy attrition. Evade avoids 1 fist
tactics.6: Giant snowball! Changes terrain. Brutal attrition. Stun 1 round if hit

name: Dire Wizard
notes: Powerful undead wizards or liches with area and targeted spells. Recovers spells or HP each round.

tactics.1: The enemy displaces, moves, or repositions
tactics.2: The enemy uses its primary single-target attack
tactics.3: The enemy uses its primary single-target attack
tactics.4: The enemy uses its primary single-target attack
tactics.5: The enemy uses its primary single-target attack
tactics.6: The enemy uses an area attack that hits many targets

name: Goblin
notes: Small green-skinned fiends who love traps and fire. Not particularly smart, but dangerous in groups.

tactics.1: Run & hide. Goblins vanish or switch to bow and arrow
tactics.2: A ragged little sword. Basic attrition
tactics.3: A ragged little sword. Basic attrition
tactics.4: A ragged little sword. Basic attrition
tactics.5: A ragged little sword. Basic attrition
tactics.6: Rickety gadgets! All foes hit with basic attrition, -3 ATK

name: Knight
notes: Highly trained warrior in plate armor. Can deliver combined equipment and flesh attrition. Uses shields tactically.

tactics.1: None listed. Assume reposition or raise shield
tactics.2: Dual weapon attack. Flesh and equipment attrition
tactics.3: Dual weapon attack. Flesh and equipment attrition
tactics.4: Dual weapon attack. Flesh and equipment attrition
tactics.5: Dual weapon attack. Flesh and equipment attrition
tactics.6: Rushing charge! Evade only. Brutal attrition + stun

name: Conjured Dead
notes: Ghosts or phantasms summoned by necromancy. Can only be harmed by magic weapons.

tactics.1: Float through walls and doors, appearing elsewhere
tactics.2: Touch of Death: Freezing necrosis, use Evade or suffer flesh attrition. Cannot avoid with Defense
tactics.3: Touch of Death: Freezing necrosis, use Evade or suffer flesh attrition. Cannot avoid with Defense
tactics.4: Touch of Death: Freezing necrosis, use Evade or suffer flesh attrition. Cannot avoid with Defense
tactics.5: Touch of Death: Freezing necrosis, use Evade or suffer flesh attrition. Cannot avoid with Defense
tactics.6: Deathly scream! All those who hear this howl roll Resist or flee in terror

name: Cryptopede
notes: Carnivorous centipede that mimics shapes to ambush prey.

tactics.1: Scurry onto out-of-reach-surfaces, hide, regenerate D10 HP
tactics.2: Pincer Bite! Basic attrition, second hit if ambushing
tactics.3: Pincer Bite! Basic attrition, second hit if ambushing
tactics.4: Pincer Bite! Basic attrition, second hit if ambushing
tactics.5: Pincer Bite! Basic attrition, second hit if ambushing
tactics.6: Whirling tail barb hits all near foes with basic attrition

name: Frost Lizard
notes: Icy-blooded reptiles that protect their eggs with freezing mist.

tactics.1: Whips tail and hurries to nearest snow or ice, recovering 10 HP
tactics.2: Freeze and shatter! Attacks cause equipment attrition
tactics.3: Freeze and shatter! Attacks cause equipment attrition
tactics.4: Freeze and shatter! Attacks cause equipment attrition
tactics.5: Freeze and shatter! Attacks cause equipment attrition
tactics.6: Deep freeze mist chills bones and freezes gear. Equipment attrition

name: Spiderkin
notes: Mutant spider horrors. Use 1d10 multiplier on stats to scale individual.

tactics.1: Skitters aside or climbs, leaves sticky web strand
tactics.6: Stinger pierces target with poison. Paralyze next round (1d4)

name: Skeleton
notes: Reanimated bones of warriors. Beware variants like the Skeleton Commander.

tactics.6: Cleave attack! Hits up to 3 foes with basic attrition
